#summary Array functions supported by the Google Refine Expression Language (GREL)

===`join(array a, string sep)`===

Returns the string obtained by joining the array a with the separator sep.

{{{
join(value.split(","),"works for")
}}}

===`reverse(array a)`===

Reverses array a.

{{{
reverse(value.partition(","))
}}}

===`sort(array a)`===

Sorts array a.

{{{
sort(value.split("Length:"))
}}}

===`sum(array a)`===

Return the sum of the numbers in the array a.

{{{
sum(partition(value,"Earnings:",true))
}}}
